items.title: A Fresh New Way of Living
items.abstract: The Fresh Air Fund offers a summer escape from New York City.

items.title: Half of N.Y.C. Households Can’t Afford to Live Here, Report Finds
items.abstract: The study is the latest piece of evidence to demonstrate the depth of New York City’s affordability crisis, which is reshaping local demographics and culture.
keywords: Fund for the City of New York
United Way of New York City

items.title: In Rural Ukraine, Medicine and Hope Roll In on a Truck
items.abstract: A mobile clinic is trying to restore medical services to villages once occupied by Russian forces as fighting rages nearby. “They’ll never beat our people,” a specialist with the team said.

items.title: Taxing Sugar to Fund a City
items.abstract: A proposal in Philadelphia would make the city richer and healthier.

items.title: White House to Begin $10 Billion Rural Investment Fund
items.abstract: The fund will be managed by Capitol Peak Asset Management and the Agriculture Department will help find projects for it.
